rules.name: Inline function in JSX event handler
rules.message: Avoid inline arrow functions in JSX event handlers. This creates a new function on every render.

rules.name: Inline object literal in JSX prop
rules.message: Avoid inline object literals in JSX props. This breaks memoization and causes unnecessary re-renders.

rules.name: Inline array literal in JSX prop
rules.message: Avoid inline array literals in JSX props. Arrays are recreated on every render.

rules.name: Missing key prop in list rendering
rules.message: Each element rendered in a list should have a unique 'key' prop to help React optimize reconciliation.

rules.name: useEffect missing dependency array
rules.message: useEffect is missing a dependency array. This can cause unnecessary re-runs and performance issues.

rules.name: Large React component
rules.message: This component is very large. Consider splitting it into smaller components for better performance and maintainability.
